title: JavaScript
description: Now the most popular programming language that can be used in the Web (its birthplace) as well as in any other application.

title: Node.js
description: Node.js is a platform built on Chrome's JavaScript runtime for building fast and scalable network applications, providing a rich library of JS modules.

title: MongoDB
description: The favourite NoSQL database that matches perfectly with data paradigm of JavaScript (JSON) and suits large-scale non-structured data sources.

title: PostgreSQL
description: One of the best open source relational database management systems, PostgreSQL is a reliable tool for storage and retrieval of structured data.

title: TypeScript
description: It is JavaScript with strong typing, that makes it tidier and more manageable in big projects. Invented in Microsoft and supported by Google.

title: Angular 2 +
description: Angular is a JavaScript platform (with TypeScript and better modularity after version 2). Created by Google to build applications with the web.

title: Jenkins
description: Jenkins is a self-contained Java-based program, ready to run out-of-the-box, with packages for Windows, Mac OS X and other Unix-like operating systems.

title: Docker
description: Docker is an open platform for developers and sysadmins to build, ship, and run distributed applications, whether on laptops, data center VMs, or the cloud.

title: Jira Software
description: Jira Software is an agile project management tool that supports any agile methodology, be it scrum, kanban, or your own unique flavor.

title: Redis
description: Redis is an open source (BSD licensed), in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache and message broker.

title: Git
description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything in most projects with speed and efficiency.

title: Slack
description: Slack is a place where your team comes together to collaborate, important information can be found by the right people..

title: Heroku
description: Heroku is a cloud platform that lets companies build, deliver, monitor and scale apps, we're the fastest way to go from idea to URL.
